Package com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.library.boole

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    And  
    BooleanCommutativeAssociative  
    BooleanSimplifier
    A Rewriter with commonly boolean connectives plus conditionals: boolean connectives (and, or, not, <=>, =>) if then else
    BooleanUtil
    A collection of utility routines related to handling boolean expressions.
    Equivalence  
    ForAll
    A collection of helper methods for handling first order logic 'for all .
    ForAllRewriter
    A TopRewriter solving universal quantification by using a given quantifier eliminator.
    Implication  
    Not  
    Or  
    ThereExists
    A collection of helper methods for handling first order logic 'there exists .
    ThereExistsRewriter
    A TopRewriter solving existential quantification by using a given quantifier eliminator.
